Speaker: You
Text: We can't release the product with this flaw.

Speaker: You
Text: I will let the client know that we have found a flaw and it will require more work.

Speaker: You
Text: I will quote them the cost of how much time it will take to fix.

Speaker: Olivia
Text: You want to give the product as is?!

Speaker: You
Text: Yes but we will let them know of the issue and that we can fix it if they pay more.
